content: When you're through the tapestry, head up the stairs and follow the path. About halfway up you'll need to shimmy across a ledge on the left to reach the other side, then you'll continue up to the Mei-Jian Peak Keeper's Shrine.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md", within the section "Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough" and the sub-section "Mount Mei". The content is presented below:

When you're through the tapestry, head up the stairs and follow the path. About halfway up you'll need to shimmy across a ledge on the left to reach the other side, then you'll continue up to the Mei-Jian Peak Keeper's Shrine.
